item.title: Need a little help, I know it's stupid
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

are you blind? i dont know anything about that type of server… but what it does when you mute. it writes in the mute logs… when you unmute it doesnt remove the name or update the player… but idk how to fix… i was just telling you whats wrong

item.source: Need a little help, I know it's stupid

item.title: Need a little help, I know it's stupid
item.dc:creator: @classy_zezima classy zezima
item.description:
@classy_zezima wrote:

What am I doing wrong here? I can mute but it won’t unmute anybody… I’ve tried for hours trying to fix this, But no luck…

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unmute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = false;
		sM("You have unmuted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unmute..");
            }
        }[/code]

Also here is my Mute code

[code]if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help, I know it's stupid
